table.name: usuev_s5_mercator

table.user_alias: Sitio de disposición final de residuos sólidos urbanos
table.name: sdf

field.name: clave_2011
field.alias: Clave del sitio de disposición final de residuos sólidos urbanos

field.name: tipodisp
field.alias: Tipo de disposición de residuos sólidos urbanos

totals.sql: select sum( cast( pobtot as numeric ) ) as "Población total", sum( cast( pobmas as numeric ) ) as "Población masculina", sum( cast( pobfem as numeric ) ) as "Población femenina", sum( cast( vivtot as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas", sum( cast( tvivhab as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas habitadas", sum( cast( pob0_14 as numeric ) )as "Población de 0 a 14 años", sum( cast( pob15_64 as numeric ) ) as "Población de 15 a 65 años", sum( cast( pob65_mas as numeric ) ) as "Población de 65 años y mas" from datosestadisticos.mun THEWHERE

select sum( cast( pobtot as numeric ) ) as "Población total", sum( cast( pobmas as numeric ) ) as "Población masculina", sum( cast( pobfem as numeric ) ) as "Población femenina", sum( cast( vivtot as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas", sum( cast( tvivhab as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas habitadas", sum( cast( pob0_14 as numeric ) )as "Población de 0 a 14 años", sum( cast( pob15_64 as numeric ) ) as "Población de 15 a 65 años", sum( cast( pob65_mas as numeric ) ) as "Población de 65 años y mas" from datosestadisticos.ent THEWHERE

select sum( cast( pobtot as numeric ) ) as "Población total", sum( cast( pobmas as numeric ) ) as "Población masculina", sum( cast( pobfem as numeric ) ) as "Población femenina", sum( cast( vivtot as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas", sum( cast( tvivhab as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas habitadas", sum( cast( pob0_14 as numeric ) )as "Población de 0 a 14 años", sum( cast( pob15_64 as numeric ) ) as "Población de 15 a 65 años", sum( cast( pob65_mas as numeric ) ) as "Población de 65 años y mas" from datosestadisticos.locrur THEWHERE

select sum( cast( pobtot as numeric ) ) as "Población total", sum( cast( pobmas as numeric ) ) as "Población masculina", sum( cast( pobfem as numeric ) ) as "Población femenina", sum( cast( vivtot as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas", sum( cast( tvivhab as numeric ) ) as "Total viviendas habitadas", sum( cast( pob0_14 as numeric ) )as "Población de 0 a 14 años", sum( cast( pob15_64 as numeric ) ) as "Población de 15 a 65 años", sum( cast( pob65_mas as numeric ) ) as "Población de 65 años y mas" from datosestadisticos.locurb THEWHERE
select elevacion as descripcion, count(elevacion) as total from altimetria.ccun50 THEWHERE group by elevacion order by elevacion

table.user_alias: Emisiones de contaminantes atmosféricos por fuentes móviles
table.name: ent
